me.koenn.cenchants.gui

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.koenn.cenchants.gui.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a button in a GUI. Add the Option to a gui by calling gui.addOption or gui.setOption

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Option(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon, ClickListener listener)
      Option listener constructor.
      Option(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Option runnable constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Option

        public Option(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon,
              java.lang.Runnable action)
        Option runnable constructor.
        Parameters:
        icon - ItemStack which will display in the gui
        action - Runnable to run when the option is clicked

      • Option

        public Option(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon,
              ClickListener listener)
        Option listener constructor.
        Parameters:
        icon - ItemStack which will display in the gui
        listener - Listener to call when the option is clicked

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public boolean run(int clickedSlot)
        Run the listener/runnable specified in the constructor. Will automaticly be called when the option is clicked in the gui.
        Parameters:
        clickedSlot - Slot in which the option has been clicked
        Returns:
        true if the listener/runnable exists and can be called

      • setLore

        public void setLore(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lore)
        Set the lore (tooltip) of the ItemStack which will display in the gui.
        Parameters:
        lore - Lore (tooltip) to set on the ItemStack

      • getIcon

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getIcon()
        Get the ItemStack to display in the gui.
        Returns:
        ItemStack to display in the gui
